超音速的ultramontane 山外的ultra-microscope 超显微镜

list.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(U1)|无忧教育 ... ultramodern 超现代的 ultramontanism 教皇绝对权力主义 ultramundane 世界之外的.
教士回复越山主义（Ultramontanism），效忠教宗热心恢复教会独位地位。因为世俗皇帝再不热心宗教，所有教士唯有寻求教宗支持。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (denoting a representative of the Roman Catholic Church north of the Alps): from medieval Latin ultramontanus, from Latin ultra 'beyond' + mons, mont- 'mountain'

means.word_mean: 1. a Roman Catholic who advocates ultramontanism (supreme papal authority in matters of faith and discipline)
2. on or relating to or characteristic of the region or peoples beyond the Alps from Italy (or north of the Alps);

sentences.sentence: "ancient transalpine Gaul was an area northwest of the Alps and included modern France and Belgium"

means.word_mean: 3. on the Italian or Roman side of the Alps;

sentences.sentence: "ancient cisalpine Gaul included an area south and east of the Alps"

auth_sentence.content: The old Ultramontane doctrine of the inerrancy of the Pope.
auth_sentence.res_content: The old Ultramontane doctrine of the inerrancy of the Pope.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The old Ultramontane doctrine of the inerrancy of the Pope.
